main_title: Ujjivan Bank Business Edge Current Account

text: POS Installation ==> Average Monthly Balance LESS THAN `25,000 : Chargeable
POS Installation ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `25,000 `50,000 : FREE
POS Installation ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `50,000 `1,00,000 : FREE
POS Installation ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `1,00,000 `5,00,000 : FREE
POS Installation ==> Average Monthly Balance GREATER THAN `5,00,000 : FREE
POS Rental ==> Average Monthly Balance LESS THAN `25,000 : Chargeable
POS Rental ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `25,000 `50,000 : Minimum Charges
POS Rental ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `50,000 `1,00,000 : FREE
POS Rental ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `1,00,000 `5,00,000 : FREE
POS Rental ==> Average Monthly Balance GREATER THAN `5,00,000 : FREE
CMS ==> Average Monthly Balance LESS THAN `25,000 : Chargeable
CMS ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `25,000 `50,000 : Minimum Charges
CMS ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `50,000 `1,00,000 : Minimum Charges
CMS ==> Average Monthly Balance BETWEEN `1,00,000 `5,00,000 : 2 Free On Call cash pickup services, There after Chargeable
CMS ==> Average Monthly Balance GREATER THAN `5,00,000 : 4 Free On Call cash pickup services, There after Chargeable
Flexi Next (Based on following slabs of Monthly Average Balance (MAB))
MAB: <1 Lakhs: 12 times of average balance maintained in the PREVIOUS month or 5 lakhs whichever is higher.
MAB: 1 Lakhs - < 5 Lakhs: 15 times of average balance maintained in the PREVIOUS month or 5 lakhs whichever is higher.
MAB: >= 5 Lakhs: 20 times of average balance maintained in the PREVIOUS month or 5 lakhs whichever is higher
Flexi Now (Based on following slabs of Monthly Average Balance (MAB))
MAB: < 1 Lakhs: 12 times of average balance maintained in the CURRENT month or 5 lakhs whichever is higher.
MAB: 1 Lakhs - < 5 Lakhs: 15 times of average balance maintained in the CURRENT month or 5 lakhs whichever is higher.
MAB: >= 5 Lakhs: 20 times of average balance maintained in the CURRENT month or 5 lakhs whichever is higher
1) Decide your own cash deposit limit according to your business seasonality, Introducing Flexi Next and Flexi Now.
2) Free IMPS, RTGS and NEFT through any channel
3) Free POS and CMS services on maintenance of required monthly average balance
4) No Additional charges for Non- Home branch transactions

5) Enjoy the benefits of Rupay Platinum Debit card 1 1 Enhanced limits of `1,50,000 per day in ATM & Shopping Lounge Access - 2 free access per quarter across 30+ Domestic lounges PAN India 5% cash back on Utility Bill payments (up to a monthly cap of `50/-) Concierge Services , 24X7 services with Hindi & English language support services Unlimited free ATM transactions at all Ujjivan Small Finance Bank ATMs and 10 free transactions at other bank ATM 50 Free Cash withdrawal at Ujjivan Branch every month 200 Free Cheque leaves per quarter Monthly Average Balance as low as `25000 Only Rewards & Benefits: For Every incremental balance maintained in the account, enjoy the benefits that provides an Edge to your Business Business
Enhanced limits of `1,50,000 per day in ATM & Shopping
Lounge Access - 2 free access per quarter across 30+ Domestic lounges PAN India
5% cash back on Utility Bill payments (up to a monthly cap of `50/-)

Monthly Average Balance as low as `25000 Only
Rewards & Benefits: For Every incremental balance maintained in the account, enjoy the benefits that provides an Edge to your Business Business
